org.apache.flink.runtime.webmonitor

类 WebMonitorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.webmonitor.WebMonitorUtils

  • public final class WebMonitorUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for the web runtime monitor. This class contains for example methods to build messages with aggregate information about the state of an execution graph, to be send to the web server.

    • 方法详细资料

      • startWebRuntimeMonitor

        public static WebMonitor startWebRuntimeMonitor(Configuration config,
                                                HighAvailabilityServices highAvailabilityServices,
                                                LeaderGatewayRetriever<JobManagerGateway> jobManagerRetriever,
                                                MetricQueryServiceRetriever queryServiceRetriever,
                                                Time timeout,
                                                ScheduledExecutor scheduledExecutor)
        Starts the web runtime monitor. Because the actual implementation of the runtime monitor is in another project, we load the runtime monitor dynamically.

        Because failure to start the web runtime monitor is not considered fatal, this method does not throw any exceptions, but only logs them.

        参数:
        config - The configuration for the runtime monitor.
        highAvailabilityServices - HighAvailabilityServices used to start the WebRuntimeMonitor
        jobManagerRetriever - which retrieves the currently leading JobManager
        queryServiceRetriever - which retrieves the query service
        timeout - for asynchronous operations
        scheduledExecutor - to run asynchronous operations

      • tryLoadWebContent

        public static <T extends RestfulGateway> java.util.Optional<StaticFileServerHandler<T>> tryLoadWebContent(GatewayRetriever<T> leaderRetriever,
                                                                                                          java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.String> restAddressFuture,
                                                                                                          Time timeout,
                                                                                                          java.io.File tmpDir)
                                                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Checks whether the flink-runtime-web dependency is available and if so returns a StaticFileServerHandler which can serve the static file contents.
        类型参数:
        T - type of the gateway to retrieve
        参数:
        leaderRetriever - to be used by the StaticFileServerHandler
        restAddressFuture - of the underlying REST server endpoint
        timeout - for lookup requests
        tmpDir - to be used by the StaticFileServerHandler to store temporary files
        返回:
        StaticFileServerHandler if flink-runtime-web is in the classpath; Otherwise Optional.empty
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if we cannot create the StaticFileServerHandler

      • validateAndNormalizeUri

        public static Path validateAndNormalizeUri(java.net.URI archiveDirUri)
        Checks and normalizes the given URI. This method first checks the validity of the URI (scheme and path are not null) and then normalizes the URI to a path.
        参数:
        archiveDirUri - The URI to check and normalize.
        返回:
        A normalized URI as a Path.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Thrown, if the URI misses scheme or path.
